properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
RED FLARE SIGHTED IN 16-45N 048-17W AT 220600Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422 799 024
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 596 596 70 9292,
FAX: 596 596 63 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
